verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4043>walking<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> for He was <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Him.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> the <S%G4634>Feast<s%> of <S%G4634>Booths,<s%> was at <S%G1451>hand.<s%>

His <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3327>"Depart<s%> from <S%G1782>here,<s%> and <S%G5217>go<s%> into <S%G2453>Judea,<s%> that Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2334>behold<s%> Your <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> You are <S%G4160>doing.<s%>

"For <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> in <S%G2927>secret,<s%> <S%G2532>when<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> to be [known] <S%G3954>publicly.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> You <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> <S%G5319>show<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> to the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"
For not <S%G3761>even<s%> His <S%G80>brothers<s%> were <S%G4100>believing<s%> in Him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "My <S%G2540>time<s%> is not <S%G3768>yet<s%> at <S%G3918>hand,<s%> but your <S%G2540>time<s%> is <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2092>opportune.<s%>

"The <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3404>hate<s%> you; but it <S%G3404>hates<s%> Me <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G3140>testify<s%> of it, that its <S%G2041>deeds<s%> are <S%G4190>evil.<s%>

<S%G305>"Go<s%> up to the <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G4771>yourselves;<s%> I do not <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> My <S%G2540>time<s%> has not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G4137>fully<s%> <S%G4137>come.<s%>"
And having <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to them, He <S%G3306>stayed<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>

But <S%G5613>when<s%> His <S%G80>brothers<s%> had <S%G305>gone<s%> up to the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up, not <S%G5320>publicly,<s%> but as it were, in <S%G2927>secret.<s%>
The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> Him at the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> and were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is He?"

And there was <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1112>grumbling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> Him; <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He is a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>man<s%>"; <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3756>"No,<s%> on the <S%G235>contrary,<s%> He <S%G4105>leads<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4105>astray.<s%>"
<S%G3305>Yet<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3954>openly<s%> of Him for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>
But when it was <S%G2235>now<s%> the <S%G3322>midst<s%> of the <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up into the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and [began to] <S%G1321>teach.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> were <S%G2296>marveling,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> has <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3609>become<s%> <S%G3609>learned,<s%> having <S%G3361>never<s%> been <S%G3129>educated<s%>?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "My <S%G1322>teaching<s%> is not <S%G1699>Mine,<s%> but His who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.

<S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> His <S%G2307>will,<s%> he shall <S%G1097>know<s%> of the <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> <S%G4220>whether<s%> it is of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> [whether] I <S%G2980>speak<s%> from <S%G1683>Myself.<s%>

"He who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> from <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1391>glory;<s%> but He who is <S%G2212>seeking<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the One who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Him, He is <S%G227>true,<s%> and there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> in Him.

" Did not <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> you the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> and [yet] <S%G3762>none<s%> of you <S%G4160>carries<s%> out the <S%G3551>Law<s%>? <S%G5101>Why<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Me?"
The <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "You <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>demon!<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2212>seeks<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> You?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2041>deed,<s%> and you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2296>marvel.<s%>

"On <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>account<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> you <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> (not <S%G3754>because<s%> it is from <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> but from the <S%G3962>fathers<s%>), and on [the] <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> you <S%G4059>circumcise<s%> a <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> on [the] <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> that the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> may not be <S%G3089>broken,<s%> are you <S%G5520>angry<s%> with Me <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>made<s%> an <S%G3650>entire<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5199>well<s%> on [the] <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%>?
"Do not <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3799>appearance,<s%> but <S%G2919>judge<s%> with <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2415>people<s%> of <S%G2415>Jerusalem<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is <S%G3778>this<s%> not the man <S%G3739>whom<s%> they are <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%>?

"And <S%G2396>look,<s%> He is <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3954>publicly,<s%> and they are <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> to Him. The <S%G758>rulers<s%> do not <S%G230>really<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> do they?

<S%G235>"However,<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> is from; but <S%G3752>whenever<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> He is from."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> Me and <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> from; and I have not <S%G2064>come<s%> of <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> but He who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me is <S%G228>true,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you do not <S%G3609>know.<s%>
"I <S%G3609>know<s%> Him; <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> from Him, and He <S%G649>sent<s%> Me."

They were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G4084>seize<s%> Him; and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1911>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> on Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> His <S%G5610>hour<s%> had not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

But <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him; and they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3752>"When<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall <S%G2064>come,<s%> He will not <S%G2038>perform<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> than those <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> has, will He?"

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1111>muttering<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him; and the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> to <S%G4084>seize<s%> Him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "For a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> with you, <S%G2532>then<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> to Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
"You shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me, and shall not <S%G2147>find<s%> Me; and <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> does <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G3195>intend<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> that we shall not <S%G2147>find<s%> Him? He is not <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> to the <S%G1290>Dispersion<s%> among the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> and <S%G1321>teach<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks,<s%> is He?

<S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>statement<s%> that He <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'You will <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me, and will not <S%G2147>find<s%> Me; and <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>'?"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> [day] of the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> let him <S%G2064>come<s%> to Me and <S%G4095>drink.<s%>

"He who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me, as the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'From his <S%G2836>innermost<s%> <S%G2836>being<s%> shall <S%G4482>flow<s%> <S%G4215>rivers<s%> of <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5204>water.<s%>'"

But <S%G3778>this<s%> He <S%G3004>spoke<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him were to <S%G2983>receive;<s%> for the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> was not <S%G3768>yet<s%> [given,] <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was not <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>

[Some] of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G230>certainly<s%> is the <S%G4396>Prophet.<s%>"

<S%G243>Others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>" Still <S%G3588>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3361>"Surely<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is not going to <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> is He?

"Has not the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> that the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> from the <S%G4690>offspring<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%> and from <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> was?"
<S%G3767>So<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4978>division<s%> in the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of Him.
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G4084>seize<s%> Him, but <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1911>laid<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on Him.

The <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and they <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not <S%G71>bring<s%> Him?"
The <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3763>"Never<s%> did a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3779>way<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2980>speaks.<s%>"
The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "You have not <S%G2532>also<s%> been <S%G4105>led<s%> <S%G4105>astray,<s%> have you?
<S%G3361>"No<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> has <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him, has he?
"But <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> which does not <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> is <S%G7074>accursed.<s%>"
<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them (he who <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him <S%G4387>before,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them),

"Our <S%G3551>Law<s%> does not <S%G2919>judge<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> it <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> from him and <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> he is <S%G4160>doing,<s%> does it?"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You are not <S%G2532>also<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> are you? <S%G2045>Search,<s%> and <S%G3708>see<s%> that <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G1453>arises<s%> out of <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>"
[And <S%G1538>everyone<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to his <S%G3624>home.<s%>
